revised_title: Richard Willstätter's Contributions to Structural Organic Chemistry
tldr: This obituary honors Richard Willstätter, a pioneer in structural organic chemistry, for his significant contributions to the field. Willstätter's work on chlorophyll and anthocyanins helped solve complex problems and paved the way for future research. Despite facing challenges due to antisemitism, Willstätter made lasting impacts in science and was awarded the Nobel Prize for Chemistry in 1915.
